title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 31.2 - Temporary provision
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 31.2 - Temporary provision

State Regulations

Notwithstanding section
31.1
of this Part, until August 1, 1964, any county, town, village or city having less than 125,000 inhabitants
may, in the alternative, use the debt statement form prescribed by the
regulation of the State Comptroller of June 13, 1961, as amended August 4, 1961, with such appropriate changes as may be required to comply with
provisions of the Local Finance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
31.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
